constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 193 (Wednesday, November 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MANN:
H.R. 5846.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article II, Section 3 of the United States Constitution,
which states that the President ``. . . shall take Care that
the Laws be faitfully executed.''
[Page H6179]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

title: Truckers Responding At National Shipping Ports Overcoming Retail Turmoil Act
